fields.name: Snap (Passive):
fields.value: If you are visited (even Astral-ly), you are hit with a 10.0x Modkill Attack. Learn the exact role of every player that visited you.

fields.name: Nature Lives, Motherfucker (Passive):
fields.value:
When you die, you are brought back into the game with a new Town role. Town will be informed that you died. Your future role will have a new ability
*Sapling: You will grow into a very tall tree. Every future visit from a Town player, you gain +0.2x Defense Power. You cannot be attacked, roleblock or in any other way harmed by a Town player.*
